Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Guangzhou Chuanghui Business Hotel in Guangzhou (Luogang), you'll be within the vicinity of Guangzhou Science City. This hotel is within the region of Lingnan College and Guangdong Olympic Stadium.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 150 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities including a nightclub and a sauna. Additional features at this Victorian hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 3 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the hotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and a computer station. Planning an event in Guangzhou? This hotel has 300 square feet (28 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and conference space. Free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 3 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the hotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Guangzhou Science City - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi
Lingnan College - 10.5 km / 6.5 mi
Guangdong Olympic Stadium - 11.8 km / 7.3 mi
Guangzhou Carambola Park - 12.5 km / 7.8 mi
Redtory Art and Design Factory - 16.4 km / 10.2 mi
Tianhe Park - 16.5 km / 10.3 mi
Pazhou Complex - 17.4 km / 10.8 mi
Lingnan Impression Park - 18.1 km / 11.2 mi
Lotus Hill - 19.2 km / 11.9 mi
Guangzhou Library - 20.1 km / 12.5 mi
CITIC Plaza - 20.2 km / 12.5 mi
Tianhe Stadium - 20.2 km / 12.6 mi
Yingzhou Ecological Park - 20.3 km / 12.6 mi
Guangdong Museum - 20.7 km / 12.8 mi
Flower City Square - 20.8 km / 12.9 mi

The preferred airport for Guangzhou Chuanghui Business Hotel is Guangzhou (CAN-Baiyun Intl.) - 34.2 km / 21.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
